sentences.en: Advertisers have made a close study of human nature and have classified all our little weaknesses.
sentences.cn: 广告者仔细研究了人的本性并且把我们的各种小小弱点一一分类. (makeaclose study仔细研究)

sentences.en: Biolar shift registers are classified as unidirectional and bidirectional.
sentences.cn: 双极型移位寄存器可分为单向和双向两种.

sentences.en: Despite being classified as a depressant, alcohol initially acts as a stimulant on the central nervous system.
sentences.cn: 虽说被划定为镇静剂，酒精最初却是被当作中枢神经系统的兴奋剂。

sentences.en: He glanced his eyes down the classified advertisements.
sentences.cn: 他浏览了一下分类广告.

sentences.en: He has a security clearance that allows him access to classified information.
sentences.cn: 他获得了安全许可，可以接触机密信息。

sentences.en: His possession of classified documents in his home was, at the very least, a violation of Navy security regulations.
sentences.cn: 他把机密文件藏在家中，至少是违反了海军安全条例。

sentences.en: Probability distributions are classified as either discrete or continuous.
sentences.cn: 概率分布为离散型和连续型两种.

sentences.en: She never participated in obtaining or copying any classified documents for anyone.
sentences.cn: 她从未参与过为任何人获取或复制机密文件之事。

sentences.en: The books in the library are classified according to subject.
sentences.cn: 图书馆的书按学科分类。

sentences.en: The document was highly classified and circulated to a very limited group of people.
sentences.cn: 这份文件高度机密，只在很小范围内传阅。

sentences.en: These needs may be classified into two subsidiary sets.
sentences.cn: 这种需要可以再分为两类.

sentences.en: This information has been classified top secret.
sentences.cn: 这一情报被归为绝密类别。

sentences.en: Thousands of classified documents have now been declassified.
sentences.cn: 数以千计的保密文件现在被解密了.

sentences.en: Tungsten is classified among the metals.

words.tran_cn: [测][遥感] 分类器；分类者；分类词

phrases.tran_cn: n. 分类广告；分类广告业务

trans.tran_en: classified information, documents etc are ones which the government has ordered to be kept secret

trans.tran_cn: 将…分类（ classify的过去式和过去分词）
